website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and durable option – ideal for beginner goalies to try out.
pros: These gloves come with finger protection but nothing on the thumbs
Many goalies prefer this style, and we find it gives more range of motion in the gloves
The foam padding on the palms lasted just as long as that on some of the more expensive gloves
cons: The glove size fits small, so we suggest ordering a size up

customer_reviews.title: Offers great specs for the price, but with some compromise in durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 y.o. who plays academy soccer and he and his teammates love this glove. It offers grip, padding and finger protection usually available in much costlier gloves. The catch? You compromise in quality. They won't last as long. The palm will start peeling a bit after a few games. But in my son's case they lasted through an entire season of 2-3 practices/week and 2 games/weekend in decent enough shape which is what I needed (at this age they outgrow them quickly anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Juan P. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for! Fits my 9 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 yr old fine with room to grow. He has used it for about 4 games and 8 practices and it has held up well so far. I'm always afraid of injuries and so I am glad it has protected his fingers at these games.
customer_reviews.author: Mama M

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, but grip is starting to come off quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, but the grip is starting to wear off quickly. It is tough to get them on and the Velcro seems to tear the padding off. The gloves feel good and have a good grip, but zip in the way of finger protection.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H. Stirk

customer_reviews.title: My son is a 15-yr old competitive goalkeeper and he loves these gloves
customer_reviews.text: because they last well, have good grip, fit well and protect his hands well. I love these gloves because they give him what he needs and they are good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: great GK mits at a good price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves and it has the finger savers boning, which is a huge plus. We originally found them in a local store, and have bought them several times in that store. They no longer carry this gk mit, but amazon does! And at a better price, bonus! Would i but then again? Yes! Only downside i have come across with owning several of these is: The palm usually starts to wear & the side of a finger came unstitched. (But then again, my son plays nearly 7days a week: school, elite travel & indoor club, & rec leagues and is rough on gear. These lasted about 4-6 months: roughly one season, plus indoor.)
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit is always perfect! My daughter has been using Vizari gloves for the past 5 years. The palms and fingertips usually wear through every 3-4 months which is comparable to the bigger name brands that cost twice as much. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ogburn

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these in an adult rec league. These will easily last a whole season possibly two. There was obvious wear and tear but that's the nature of the position and any gloves I've ever owned get beat up. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: For context: I am a 6'4" adult goalkeeper in ...
customer_reviews.text: For context: I am a 6'4" adult goalkeeper in indoor and outdoor leagues. I normally wear Nike gloves. My hands are probably a bit small for my size, so I wear a size 9 Nike. So I ordered these in a size 9. Vizari's glove is a little smaller so perhaps next time I will go with a size 10. I have played 2 games so far. The padding is already starting to come off but honestly this happens with most gloves. My biggest criticism of this product is the velcro strap. When you strap it on there is nowhere to fasten the rest of the strap, so it just hangs out there (not normal for gk gloves).
customer_reviews.author: JimyVee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter U9 soccer team. This is the first year they get to have a goalie. We did not want to spend a lot, but we also did not want a cheap pair that would last a game or two. We are 6 games into the season and they are still working great. I highly recommend these to a first time goalie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for wear and tear.
customer_reviews.text: My son has used these for only 2 games and they are starting to wear in the palm. Not impressed at all with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: da-cam

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: After one practice, these gloves are worn down and almost unusable. I never imagined that they would be so poorly made. Spend a little more money and purchase a pair that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Corey P

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. My daughter has been using this brand for over a year and we keep coming back.
customer_reviews.author: mntnpeak

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good but the ball slips out of the hands with these.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for soccer goaling but run large
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves but run LARGE! My 10 year old daughter needed some goalie gloves. These fit the bill well but they are large.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great value gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great, have really good value, and are decently durable. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: My nephew could not be happier. In fact I am going to purchase another ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew could not be happier. In fact I am going to purchase another pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mery Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Decent Gloves for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves, good price for these gloves but they are obviously not the same quality as more expensive brands. You get what you pay for and I'm okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but ages badly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to play in a league with my coworkers. 7 games in, they do the job, but the grip is falling apart pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Zov

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These may be fine but wow are they small. We've had size 10 in the past and this size 10 is so small I couldn't put it on my pinky.
customer_reviews.author: Chekunda

customer_reviews.title: We have purchased so many even the super expensive brands and these are her go to ones
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter absolutely loves these gloves. We have purchased so many even the super expensive brands and these are her go to ones.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Newman

customer_reviews.title: Decent glove for the money, but wears out easily on turf
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable gloves with good finger protection, but the foam on the palm falls apart pretty easily, especially when playing on turf.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Silton

customer_reviews.title: Quality better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the level of quality received with these gloves. I'm sure the foam palms will tear eventually just like every other glove that uses this same material, but for ~$28, the quality far surpassed my expectations. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: the padding is good but the overall build is extremely poor
customer_reviews.text: the gloves ripped in the first game. the padding is good but the overall build is extremely poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels good good grip cheap price im really happy i hope ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels good good grip cheap price im really happy i hope yall can make black palm gloves that will be awesome i will buy more
customer_reviews.author: ismael aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Love the gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love the gloves. Soft, great grip, and don't wear off too easy. Wish they made a larger size like 12. 11 is the largest I could find, pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: AtoZ Guy

customer_reviews.title: They looked and felt great. The boy loved the gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday present. They looked and felt great. The boy loved the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vizari Modena F.R.F Glove
product_meta.description: Excellent match quality glove. 3MM german latex palm. Super soft foam backhand. Finger reinforcement frame (F.R.F). 8cm elastic fitted wristband.
feature_bullets: Item Package Dimensions: 6.096 L X 12.7 W X 25.654 H (Cm)
